note: The chapter where Albaz and Ecclesia begin their journey together.

parameters: I'm not sure what's going on.
I don't know either, you got a name?
Well, I think Shuraig needs your help...
Well, I think Shuraig needs your help...
Sis! It's been a while, do ya wanna hang out a bit?
Do you want Ferrijit to join your party?
I hope you two are holding up okay, any sign of Kitt?
She's the one that protected me...
Fleurdelis! Where is she? Oh my...
Oh, the one that destroyed my mask? She's fine.
How can you be so certain? Please promise!
I'll leave the two of you to it, then. We still have business in the Nation...
There's definitley more to your sudden appearance, I'd say...
It's about time you woke up.
What's your name, by the way?
Name's Shuraig. I'm the leader of the Tri-Brigade. That rag-tag bunch you saw back there.
Silent guy huh? Well, it can't be helped either way. We're going to need your help while she recovers.
That fight did a number on our weapons- and I suspect the Dogmatika will fight back, so we need to find our engineer.
She's taken off to the Great Sea of Golgonda, but getting there is tricky...
So we're going to need our Mercourier... but unfortunatley it's run off too.
Anyway, go look around for the Mercourier. It's a small metal bird. If you'd like, I could come with you.
Would you like Shuraig to join your party?
Suit yourself, but don't come back here if you get yourself killed!
Suit yourself, but don't come back here if you get yourself killed!
I think I'll stay here with Shuraig for a while.
